Playing stock career. Accepted two contracts. Launched to complete both.

Went to Mission Control. Discovered I now had four new Contracts. However, all were in ACTIVE tab, not Available tab. Not only that, I'm supposed to have only two active contracts; I now have four.

Got a screenshot if needed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T17:36:22Z" title="04/28/2015 05:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Claw**

> 
> Playing stock career. Accepted two contracts. Launched to complete both.
> Went to Mission Control. Discovered I now how four new Contracts. However, all were in ACTIVE tab, not Available tab. Not only that, I'm supposed to have only two active contracts; I now have four.
> 
> Got a screenshot if needed.

Give us the screenshot, some contracts are accepted automatically and don't take up space.

Issues go in Support, don't forget, and please check out the support stickies for info on where to find your logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
don't think that is a bug. but a new feature that records are completed automatically

Yeah, this sound like one of features shown in the 1.0 livestreams - those are contracts that are automatically accepted, and do not count towards the usual contract limits. It's to stop the previous issues where you had to the multiple suborbital flights to get all the contracts completed before going to space.

So then, not a bug. Additional contracts have required acceptance.

Feel free to close this thread.

Per request. Though we do appreciate the point outs. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

-Claw
